head.title: no-missing-eof-newline
head.description: no-missing-eof-newline Disallow missing end-of-file newlines in non-empty files. Options true The following patterns are considered…

body:
#no-missing-eof-newline

Disallow missing end-of-file newlines in non-empty files.

    a { color: pink; }
    \n
/** ↑
 * This newline */

#Options

#true

The following patterns are considered warnings:

a { color: pink; }

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

a { color: pink; }
\n

Completely empty files are not considered warnings.
rawBody:
# no-missing-eof-newline

Disallow missing end-of-file newlines in non-empty files.

```css
    a { color: pink; }
    \n
/** ↑
 * This newline */
```

## Options

### `true`

The following patterns are considered warnings:

```css
a { color: pink; }
```

The following patterns are *not* considered warnings:

```css
a { color: pink; }
\n
```

Completely empty files are not considered warnings.
raw:
---
title: no-missing-eof-newline
---

# no-missing-eof-newline

Disallow missing end-of-file newlines in non-empty files.

```css
    a { color: pink; }
    \n
/** ↑
 * This newline */
```

## Options

### `true`

The following patterns are considered warnings:

```css
a { color: pink; }
```

The following patterns are *not* considered warnings:

```css
a { color: pink; }
\n
```

Completely empty files are not considered warnings.
